page.title: 16Peopleton
page.content:
Peopleton is a small village to the north of Pershore. Its centre is now a {Conservation Area}since it plays host to some fine old buildings.
The main buildings of interest are the Crown Inn, the White House with its hall of{cruck construction, Norchard House which is a brick building of the Queen Anne period, and the church which dates back to the early twelfth century.
The church has a beam which is a finely carved part of a former{rood {screen.}Several of its windows are from the{Perpendicular period.
Amenities in the villages include a playing field, a children's play area and a village hall.
